019package org.jgrapes.osgi.webconlet.logviewer;
020
021import de.mnl.osgi.coreutils.ServiceCollector;
022import freemarker.core.ParseException;
023import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
024import freemarker.template.Template;
025import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
026import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.io.PrintWriter;
029import java.io.Serializable;
030import java.util.Collections;
031import java.util.HashMap;
032import java.util.HashSet;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.Set;
036import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
037import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
038import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
039import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
040import org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop;
041import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
042import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession;
043import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsoleUtils;
044import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
045import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
046import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
047import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
048import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
052import org.osgi.framework.BundleContext;
053import org.osgi.service.log.LogEntry;
054import org.osgi.service.log.LogListener;
055import org.osgi.service.log.LogReaderService;
056
057/**
058 * A conlet for displaying the OSGi log.
059 */
060public class LogViewerConlet extends FreeMarkerConlet<Serializable> {
061
062    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES
063        = RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.View);
064    private final ServiceCollector<LogReaderService,
065            LogReaderService> logReaderCollector;
066    private LogReaderService logReaderResolved;
067    private final LogListener logReaderListener;
068
069    /**
070     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
071     * 
072     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
073     *            on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
074     *            sends the event to
075     */
076    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UnusedFormalParameter")
077    public LogViewerConlet(Channel componentChannel, BundleContext context) {
078        super(componentChannel);
079        logReaderListener = new LogListener() {
080            @Override
081            public void logged(LogEntry entry) {
082                addEntry(entry);
083            }
084        };
085        logReaderCollector
086            = new ServiceCollector<>(context, LogReaderService.class);
087        logReaderCollector.setOnBound((ref, svc) -> subscribeTo(svc))
088            .setOnModfied((ref, svc) -> subscribeTo(svc))
089            .setOnUnbinding((ref, svc) -> subscribeTo(svc));
090        logReaderCollector.open();
091    }
092
093    private void subscribeTo(LogReaderService logReaderService) {
094        if (logReaderResolved != null
095            && logReaderResolved.equals(logReaderService)) {
096            return;
097        }
098        // Got a new log reader service.
099        if (logReaderResolved != null) {
100            logReaderResolved.removeLogListener(logReaderListener);
101        }
102        logReaderResolved = logReaderService;
103        if (logReaderResolved != null) {
104            logReaderResolved.addLogListener(logReaderListener);
105        }
106
107    }
108
109    @Handler(channels = Channel.class)
110    public void onStop(Stop event) {
111        logReaderCollector.close();
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
116     *
117     * @param event the event
118     * @param channel the channel
119     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
120     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
121     *             exception
122     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
123     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
124     */
125    @Handler
126    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleSession channel)
127            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
128            ParseException, IOException {
129        // Add conlet resources to page
130        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
131            .setDisplayNames(
132                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
133            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.View)
134            .addScript(new ScriptResource()
135                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
136                    type(), "LogViewer-functions.ftl.js"))
137                .setScriptType("module"))
138            .addCss(event.renderSupport(),
139                WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath("LogViewer-style.css")));
140    }
141
142    @Override
143    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
144            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId, Serializable conletState)
145            throws Exception {
146        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
147        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.View)) {
148            Template tpl
149                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("LogViewer-view.ftl.html");
150            channel.respond(new RenderConletFromTemplate(event,
151                type(), conletId, tpl,
152                fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState))
153                    .setRenderAs(RenderMode.View.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
154                    .setSupportedModes(MODES));
155            sendAllEntries(channel, conletId);
156            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
157        }
158        return renderedAs;
159    }
160
161    private void sendAllEntries(ConsoleSession channel, String conletId) {
162        final LogReaderService logReader = logReaderResolved;
163        if (logReader == null) {
164            return;
165        }
166        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
167            conletId, "entries",
168            (Object) Collections.list(logReader.getLog()).stream()
169                .map(entry -> logEntryAsMap(entry)).toArray()));
170    }
171
172    private void addEntry(LogEntry entry) {
173        for (ConsoleSession consoleSession : trackedSessions()) {
174            for (String conletId : conletIds(consoleSession)) {
175                consoleSession.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
176                    conletId, "addEntry", logEntryAsMap(entry))
177                        .disableTracking());
178            }
179        }
180    }
181
182    private Map<String, Object> logEntryAsMap(LogEntry entry) {
183        Map<String, Object> result = new HashMap<>();
184        result.put("bundle",
185            Optional
186                .ofNullable(entry.getBundle().getHeaders().get("Bundle-Name"))
187                .orElse(entry.getBundle().getSymbolicName()));
188        result.put("exception", Optional.ofNullable(entry.getException())
189            .map(exc -> exc.getMessage()).orElse(""));
190        result.put("stacktrace", Optional.ofNullable(entry.getException())
191            .map(exc -> {
192                ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
193                PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(out);
194                exc.printStackTrace(pw);
195                pw.close();
196                return out.toString();
197            }).orElse(""));
198        result.put("location", Optional.ofNullable(entry.getLocation())
199            .map(loc -> loc.toString()).orElse(""));
200        result.put("loggerName", entry.getLoggerName());
201        result.put("logLevel", entry.getLogLevel().toString());
202        result.put("message", entry.getMessage());
203        result.put("sequence", entry.getSequence());
204        result.put("service", Optional.ofNullable(entry.getServiceReference())
205            .map(Object::toString).orElse(""));
206        result.put("threadInfo", entry.getThreadInfo());
207        result.put("time", entry.getTime());
208        return result;
209    }
210
211    /*
212     * (non-Javadoc)
213     * 
214     * @see org.jgrapes.console.AbstractConlet#doNotifyConletModel
215     */
216    @Override
217    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
218            ConsoleSession channel, Serializable conletState)
219            throws Exception {
220        event.stop();
221        switch (event.method()) {
222        case "resync":
223            sendAllEntries(channel, event.conletId());
224            break;
225        }
226    }
227
228    @Override
229    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession channel,
230            String conletId) throws Exception {
231        return true;
232    }
233}
